headline: Cybersecurity: The innovation and worries around agentic AI
summary: AI is being deployed on both fronts of the cyber battlefield — from the cybersecurity firms offering protection to consumers and from hackers. TECHnalysis Research, LLC President Bob O'Donnell sits down with Yahoo Finance markets and data editor Jared Blikre on Market Catalysts to outline the innovation and worries tied to the deployment of agentic AI, especially when it is used in cybersecurity capacities. Watch Yahoo Finance's interview with CrowdStrike (CRWD) president Michael Sentonas on how the cybersecurity industry is using AI to combat hacks. Also read up on how North Korean hackers were responsible for over $2 billion in crypto losses in 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
